doc:
Matthew Scurfield https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Matthew_Scurfield 0 Matthew Scurfield (born 2 February 1948, in Cambridge, Cambridgeshire) is an English actor and the eldest child of author George Scurfield and his wife Cecilia (née Hopkinson). His autobiography, I Could Be Anyone, was published in 2008 (ISBN 978-0-9556952-0-9). Matthew_Scurfield ( born 2_February_1948 , in Cambridge , Cambridgeshire ) is an_English_actor and the_eldest_child of author_George_Scurfield and his_wife_Cecilia ( née_Hopkinson ) . His_autobiography , I Could_Be Anyone , was_published in 2008_(_ISBN_978-0-9556952-0-9_) .
